mapper.select:
select count(m.id) from V7_MEMBER m
1=1
and m.V7_M_NAME like '%${v7MName}%'
and m.V7_M_NUM like '%${v7MNum}%'
and m.V7_M_PHONE like '%${v7MPhone}%'
and v7_m_crate_time >= #{v7MBeginTime}
and m.v7_m_crate_time <= #{v7MEndTime}
and m.v7_m_status != 3

SELECT m.id id, m.V7_M_NUM , m.V7_M_NAME, m.V7_M_SEX , m.V7_M_PHONE , m.V7_M_BIRTHDAY, m.V7_M_STATUS, m.v7_m_crate_time, m.v7_m_real_name, c.id cardId, c.V7_C_TYPE, c.V7_C_SURPLUS_AMOUNT, c.V7_C_RECHARGE_AMOUNT, c.V7_C_TINTEGRAL, c.V7_C_STATUS, c.V7_C_REMARKS, c.V7_PK_MEMBER FROM V7_MEMBER m, V7_CARD c
c.`V7_PK_MEMBER`=m.`ID` and m.ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM V7_MEMBER m WHERE m.v7_m_name = #{inName}
SELECT * FROM V7_MEMBER m WHERE m.v7_m_phone = #{inName}
mapper.sql: ID, v7_m_num, v7_m_name, v7_m_real_name, v7_m_sex, v7_m_birthday, v7_m_passowrd, v7_m_status, v7_m_phone, v7_re_c_type, v7_m_create_user, v7_m_crate_time, v7_m_update_user, V7_m_update_time, v7_m_remarks, extends1, extends2, extends3, extends4, extends5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from V7_MEMBER
order by ${orderByClause}
